body_html:
Alternative: the exception that gets thrown in this case is a AttributeError:

Exception ignored in: <bound method BaseSession.__del__ of <tensorflow.python.client.session.Session object at 0x112402c50>>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/client/session.py", line 587, in __del__
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'TF_NewStatus'

I can change the except clause to catch only an AttributeError instead.

body:
Alternative: the exception that gets thrown in this case is a *AttributeError*:

```
Exception ignored in: <bound method BaseSession.__del__ of <tensorflow.python.client.session.Session object at 0x112402c50>>
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.6/site-packages/tensorflow/python/client/session.py", line 587, in __del__
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'TF_NewStatus'
```

I can change the `except` clause to catch only an AttributeError instead.
